title: Parts of the esports industry could be entering 'correction mode,' says esports ETF partner
description: Investors have poured into the esports space, but one fund partner warns that a "correction" could be coming for certain parts of the market.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves in the premarket: Pfizer, DuPont, Wayfair, Shake Shack & more
description: The stocks making the biggest moves in premarket trading include Pfizer, DuPont, Wayfair, Shake Shack, and more.

title: Treasury yields rise amid state reopening efforts, investors pivot toward stocks
description: U.S. government debt yields rose Tuesday as a flurry of U.S. states moved forward with plans to reopen their economies.

title: 'It's can or die' for Bay Area breweries, as beermakers reckon with bar and restaurant closures
description: With California residents sheltered in place for almost two months, breweries have found their only way to reach consumers is by canning as much beer as possible.

title: Shake Shack is seeing 'significant' increases in beef prices as coronavirus leads to plant closures
description: Shake Shack said Monday that it is seeing significantly higher beef prices as the coronavirus pandemic forces the closure of meatpacking plants.

title: Buyers appear to be 'calling the bottom' in the JETS airline ETF, market analyst says
description: As airline stocks tumble, investors in the U.S. Global Jets ETF (JETS) seem to betting on a further bailout for the group, says market researcher Dave Nadig.

title: Italy's Fincantieri will build newest class of US Navy warships
description: CNBC spent a day aboard the Italian Navy's Fincantieri-built Alpino warship in 2018 while the vessel toured the U.S. East Coast.

title: Shares of parent of Victoria's Secret crater after effort to sell itself falls through
description: L Brands said it is still interested in "establishing Bath & Body Works as a pure-play public company" and it hopes to prepare its Victoria's Secret businesses to operate as a standalone company.

title: California Gov. Gavin Newsom says some businesses will reopen Friday, with conditions
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Monday said some of the state's retail businesses could begin reopening with modifications by the end of this week if certain criteria are met.

title: NBCUniversal reorganizes leadership team, chairman of news to step down
description: The company's news networks, including NBC News, MSNBC and CNBC, will be condensed into a single unit under Cesar Conde, now chairman of NBCUniversal News Group.

title: The PC is suddenly cool again ... for now
description: People are spending much more time using Windows PCs, and the Mac installed base reached a new high in Apple's most recent quarter.

title: Senate office says it lacks 'discretion' to release possible Biden complaint
description: The statement from the Secretary of the Senate's office spurred more questions from the Biden campaign about who controls the documents.

title: JC Penney goes to court to try to stop Sephora from pulling out of the troubled chain's stores
description: J.C. Penney has filed a temporary restraining order against Sephora in a bid to stop the pullout.

title: Op-Ed: Steve Case calls on Congress to provide more relief to start-ups to fuel job growth
description: The U.S. needs to grow our way out of this crisis, by backing start-ups all around the country that can create jobs and strengthen our economy for the future, Steve Case writes.

title: WHO says it will engage US to make remdesivir coronavirus treatment more widely available
description: WHO welcomes the recent data from a U.S. government-run clinical trial showing the drug appeared to be effective in reducing recovery times for Covid-19 patients, one official says.
